titles.title: Permitting official photographs of the House of Representatives to be taken while the House is in actual session on a date designated by the Speaker.
Permitting official photographs of the House of Representatives to be taken while the House is in actual session on a date designated by the Speaker.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Mr. Aguilar asked unanimous consent to consider as introduced.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: This resolution authorizes official photographs of the House of Representatives to be taken while the House is in actual session, on a date designated by the Speaker.
